content.prompt: Which of the following is an accurate description of the trend in wheat prices shown on the graph?

choices.label: Wheat prices remained largely unchanged in the period 1650 to 1705.
Wheat prices showed considerable variation but declined overall in the period 1650 to 1705.
Wheat prices showed considerable variation but rose overall in the period 1650 to 1705.
Wheat prices steadily declined in the period 1650 to 1705.

topic.text: 3.3: Continuities and Changes to Economic Practice and Development

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
